prefs-description-personal: Gu mi ka taɣi a ni yirina shɛm,laɣimgubi, ka mali saawara.
password-name-match: A pasɛwɛdi tumi ni di waligi ka chɛ nyin ŋun su yuli
prefs-help-yourpassword: Akaunti maa bɔ n-gbaai soli biɛni.  Nyami $1 din yɛn tooi sɔŋ ŋa mali zali.
tog-prefershttps: Che ka a gɔhibu mali yɛmbahaga saha kam a yi yɛn kpe
gender-notknown: Bɛ ni niŋ maliniŋ wiki paajima shɛŋa ni
gender-male: 99o niŋ la maliniŋ wiki paajinima maa ni
tog-fancysig:
Lihimi nua dihibu ŋɔ kamani (without an automatic link
 to your user page)
prefs-changeemail: Taɣimi bee yihimi lahibal bɛhigu shee
prefs-help-email-required: Di Ella talahi ni kpɛhi a Email.
tog-requireemail: Ti mi paswɛti malizali din deei yi niŋ ka emails mini ŋun su yuli yi bɛni.
emailconfirmlink: Yulimi a email addressi ka dihi tabli
tog-ccmeonemails: Timma yaabu lahabali shɛli n ni zaŋ ti ban su
tog-enotifwatchlistpages: Timma lahabali di yi niŋ ka ŋunsu yaɣili di alizama ka taɣi
tog-enotifusertalkpages: Timma lahabali di yi niŋ ka ŋunsu alizama yaɣili taɣi
tog-enotifminoredits: Lahi timma lahabali zankpa  din pora malli niŋ  mini lahabali kpanjoɣu
tog-enotifrevealaddr: Viimi n lahabali biɛhigu shee ni tibili lahabali
tog-diffonly: Di yihi paaji yaɣa polo zaa
tog-norollbackdiff: Di yihi ŋa polo din deei yi niŋ ka a yɛn labi nyaaŋa
tog-showrollbackconfirmation: Wuhimi dihitabili bia din deei yi niŋ ka a yɛn dihi nyaaŋa labu zaŋ gɔhi linki
tog-forcesafemode: Sahakam che ka [[mw:Manual:Safemode|safe mode]] kuli nyɔ n-ʒiya
tog-editsectiononrightclick: Dihimi nudirigu yɛɣili kadi ti-soli ka yaɣili-ŋɔ mali niŋ niŋ tabata
tog-editondblclick: Malimi yaɣa ŋɔ niŋ buyi dihi parim ni
tog-minordefault: Dalimmi mali niŋ zaa din bora din nyɛ shɛm
tog-forceeditsummary: Teemi ma n yi ti bi sabi lahabali jia (bee din pun ku bɛni ka labisim lahabali ji' maa)
tog-useeditwarning: Kpahimi n-zuɣu di yi niŋ ka n yi yiri maliniŋ puuni ka be naai soya maa zaa
tog-previewonfirst: Wuhimi ma n johi lihi n tuuli mali niŋ ni
tog-previewontop: Wuhimi daŋlihi pɔi ni mali niŋ adaka maa
tog-uselivepreview: Wuhimi johi lihi amaa ka di pa a lan yɛn labimi yooi
recentchangesdays: Dabisi shɛŋa din wuhiri taɣibu din na yɔli taɣi:
prefs-help-recentchangescount: Di yi kuli galisi yaɣi zaa: 1000
tog-usenewrc: Laɣimi taɣibu nim n-doli yaɣili din be taɣiri shɛŋa din na yoli niŋ ni bɛ ni lihiri shɛli
tog-hideminor: Suɣami mali niŋ din bi galisi maa ka chɛ punpuŋɔ taɣabu maa
tog-hidepatrolled: Sɔɣi mi mali niŋ shɛŋa bini nabi gɔŋgili li ka chɛ din na yoli taɣi yaɣili
tog-newpageshidepatrolled: Sɔɣimi palo shɛli a ni gula ka che kaali sahakam
tog-shownumberswatching: Wuhimi kalinli ŋan lihiri ban mali akaunti sulinsi
prefs-description-watchlist: Baŋ mi a ni yɛn niŋ shɛm a lɛbiɣi paajinima shɛŋa zuɣu a ni yuuni maa.
prefs-editwatchlist-label: Maliniŋ shɛŋa niŋ ka be a ni lihiri shɛli ni:
prefs-editwatchlist-edit: Yulimi ka yihi yɛlikpana din be a ninni yulibu ŋɔ ni
prefs-watchlist-days: Dabisa ŋan wuhiri a ni lihiri shɛŋa:
prefs-watchlist-edits: A ni tooi kpaŋ a maŋa n-niŋ taɣibu shɛŋa ka di be a ni yuuni shɛŋa puuni:
prefs-watchlist-edits-max: Di yi Juli galisi yaɣi zaa: 1000
tog-extendwatchlist: Yeligimi ani yuuni binshɛŋa din yan wuhi a taɣibu zaa, amaa ka din na yoli niŋ koŋko
tog-watchlistunwatchlinks: pahimi bɛni yuli shɛli bee bɛ ni bɛ yuli shɛli ({{int:Watchlist-unwatch}}/{{int:Watchlist-unwatch-undo}}) n tooi yuli paajinima nya taɣibu (JavaScript required for toggle functionality)
tog-watchlisthideminor: Soɣimi din bora mali ni ti kpa ni yuuni shɛŋa
tog-watchlisthidebots: dɔɣim mashini mali niŋ ka n-ni tum shɛli
tog-watchlisthideown: Soɣami n mali niŋ ka che n ni yuuni sheŋa maa
tog-watchlisthideanons: Sɔɣimi maliniŋ ka che ban je ni bɛ baŋ ba dundɔŋ maa ni
tog-watchlisthideliu: Dɔɣim mali niŋ ka che ban kpɛma dundɔŋ maa ni
tog-watchlistreloadautomatically: Labi yooi n ni lihiri shɛli a toli di yi ti niŋ ka filta taɣi (di bori JavaScript)
tog-watchlisthidepatrolled: Sɔɣimi ban yuuni maliniŋ ni niŋ maliniŋ shɛli
tog-watchdefault: Pahimi yaɣa mini faals ni mali niŋ n yuuni binshɛŋa
tog-watchmoves: Zaŋ mi yaɣa shɛŋa n ni nam ni faali shɛŋa n ni tirisi m pahi n ni lihiri bin shɛŋa puuni
tog-watchdeletion: Pahimi yaɣa mini faals ni yihi ti ni yuuni shɛŋa
tog-watchcreations: Zaŋ mi yaɣa shɛŋa n ni nam ni faali shɛŋa ni yaai m pahi n ni lihiri bin shɛŋa puuni
tog-watchuploads: Pahimi faali pala m-pahi n-n pun zaŋ shŋa niŋ maa ni
tog-watchrollback: Zaŋ mi yaɣa shɛŋa n ni labisi m pahi n ni lihiri bin shɛŋa puuni
prefs-description-searchoptions: Piimi a ni bɔri ni a ƒuma shɛhira yina shɛm.
restoreprefs: Labisimi ŋa zaa dini di pun be shɛm
